original_text: He took the tablets of the covenant law and placed them in the ark, attached the poles to the ark and put the atonement cover over it.
korean_text: 그는 또 증거판을 궤 속에 넣고 채를 궤에 꿰고 속죄소를 궤 위에 두고

sentences.original_text: He took the tablets of the covenant law
and placed them in the ark
attached the poles to the ark
and put the atonement cover over it
